overview: Three brothers. One wild and horny, the other on shore leave, and the youngest still a virgin. Sexual freedom is explored as sibling heat rises to a boiling point. What happens when the baby brother gets caught peeping on his horny older brother and his fuck buddies? He gets a good dose of brotherly discipline from both ends. Coy Dekker directs the three nasty brothers' sexual adventures.
tagline: AN ASS-RIPPIN' AND ORAL INCEST FUCK-FEST, BUTTS AND MOUTHS FULL OF HARD POUNDING COCK! HUGE COCKS THROBBING IN EXCITEMENT!
title: Oh, Brother
